bodyPatterns.equalToXml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><PolicySet xmlns="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:3.0:core:schema:wd-17" PolicySetId="myTestPolicy" Version="1.0.0" PolicyCombiningAlgId="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:3.0:policy-combining-algorithm:deny-unless-permit" MaxDelegationDepth="10"><Description>Test policy</Description><Target/></PolicySet>
